alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 4:38PM MDT until March 16 at 6:52PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City UT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Utah... Virgin River At Bloomington affecting Washington County. For the Virgin River...including Bloomington...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Virgin River At Bloomington. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, the Virgin River is expected to flood the Bloomington Park area bordering the Virgin River near Bloomington. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will peak around moderate flood stage with a maximum value of 17.1 feet, or 10,800 cubic feet per second (CFS), tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.8 feet on 01/05/2008. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 445 AM MDT.
